mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO oe_message (id, user_id,context, type, status,is_delete, create_person, create_time, readstatus, detail_id, route_type, outer_link) VALUES
(#{message.id},#{message.userId},#{message.context},#{message.type}, #{message.status},#{message.deleted}, #{message.createPerson}, #{message.createTime}, #{message.readStatus}, #{message.detailId}, #{message.routeType}, #{message.outerLink})
